Content: Buildings should be traced by size not by number. So we do not have 42
mines but one mine of size 19 and one of size 23. Reducing memory

consumption and necessary calculations.
The construction of large
buildings should be incentivized by efficency increase per added

size-point with diminishing returns.
The advantage of multiple
buildings is that random events (e.g. strikes) are only obstructing a
fraction of the local industry (unless it is a colony-wide strike).
